subject: Negotiation
title: Defending Against Unethical Influence
description: A 60-second lesson on Defending Against Unethical Influence.

hook.text: Knowing how influence works is the best defense against those who misuse it.

buildup.text: Recognize the tactics: artificial urgency, emotional manipulation, information hiding, and social pressure.

discovery.text: When you feel rushed, pressured, or emotionally overwhelmed, pause. Those feelings are often engineered.

twist.text: The most effective defense isn't suspicion ‚Äî it's knowledge. Understanding the playbook makes you immune to it.

climax.text: Ask for time, seek outside opinions, and verify claims independently before committing.

punchline.text: The best defense against manipulation is understanding exactly how it works.

quiz.question: What is the best defense against unethical influence?
options: Understanding how influence tactics work so you can recognize them
